name: Mysterious Mystery
description:
Dakota and Justin, 2 best friends in high school but this isn't any normal high schoolers. 

Justin is a straight up genius! Though...he sometimes let's that get the better of him...

Dakota is...not as smart but he does have heart! He loves helping out when he can!

As Dakota, discover evidence that Justin can use in his "logic battles" to figure out what actually happened at the crime scene. 

You'll need to use your logic and detective skills in this humorous mystery game

Current Build: Version 1.0.1

Patch update:

Fixed music levels for some scenes

Fixed dialouge to be in correct voice line

Gave player more health

Player now regains health after each confrentation

Updated Npc placement

New Npc movement in cutscences
